text.div:
Extended Priority Codes

CodeDescriptionNederlands (Dutch)CommentVersion
A ASAPZo spoedig mogelijkFill after S ordersadded v2.5
C CallbackTerugbellenadded v2.5
P PreopPre-opadded v2.5
PRN As neededZoals noodzakelijkadded v2.5
R RoutineRoutineDefaultadded v2.5
S StatSTATWith highest priorityadded v2.5
T Timing criticalTiming kritiekA request implying that it is critical to come as close as possible to the requested time, e.g. for a trough anti-microbial level.added v2.5
TD<integer> Timing critical within <integer> days.Timing kritiek binnen <integer> dagen.Timing critical within <integer> days.added v2.5
TH<integer> Timing critical within <integer> hours.Timing kritiek binnen <integer> uur.Timing critical within <integer> hours.added v2.5
TL<integer> Timing critical within <integer> months.Timing kritiek binnen <integer> maanden.Timing critical within <integer> months.added v2.5
TM<integer> Timing critical within <integer> minutes.Timing kritiek binnen <integer> minuten.Timing critical within <integer> minutes.added v2.5
TS<integer> Timing critical within <integer> seconds.Timing kritiek binnen <integer> seconden.Timing critical within <integer> seconds.added v2.5
TW<integer> Timing critical within <integer> weeks.Timing kritiek binnen <integer> weken.Timing critical within <integer> weeks.added v2.5

name: v2 Extended Priority Codes
description: FHIR Value set/code system definition for HL7 v2 table 0485 ( Extended Priority Codes)
